articles.description: Briton Daniel Dubois retains IBF title with a destruction of Anthony Joshua at Wembley Stadium in London.
articles.title: Joshua vs Dubois: Daniel Dubois stops Anthony Joshua in five rounds at Wembley Stadium

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says people expect to see Manchester City wiped "off the face of the Earth" over the club's alleged financial rule breaches.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola says people expect Manchester City to be 'wiped from face of Earth' over alleged breaches

articles.description: Argentina secure a dramatic win against South Africa to stop the world champions from winning the Rugby Championship title with a game to spare.
articles.title: Argentina 29-28 South Africa: Rugby Championship hopes alive for Pumas

articles.description: Man City midfielder Rodri has a strong claim to be the most influential player in the world right now with just one defeat for club or country in the past 18 months.
articles.title: Man City: 'Disaster' to 'winning machine' - is Rodri the best in the world?

articles.description: Harry Kane becomes the top scoring English player in Bundesliga history as he nets his 41st league goal for Bayern Munich in their 5-0 win at Werder Bremen.
articles.title: Werder Bremen 0-5 Bayern Munich: Harry Kane becomes top scoring English player in Bundesliga history

articles.description: Lando Norris beats title rival Max Verstappen to pole position in a dramatic qualifying session at the Singapore Grand Prix.
articles.title: Singapore Grand Prix: Lando Norris on pole alongside Max Verstappen

articles.description: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot says he did not want Darwin Nunez to shoot in the lead-up to the Uruguayan’s sensational strike against Bournemouth on Saturday.
articles.title: Darwin Nunez: Liverpool striker shows boss Arne Slot quality with stunning strike

articles.description: England fall 2-0 down in the one-day international series against Australia as their batting wilts in the second match in Headingley.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Hosts' batters blown away as tourists take 2-0 lead

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Espanyol in the Primera División
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Anthony Joshua says he will continue fighting after suffering a devastating knockout defeat against IBF heavyweight champion Daniel Dubois.
articles.title: Dubois vs Joshua: Anthony Joshua vows to keep on fighting despite defeat
